page.title: 07RECREATION-HARMSTON & COLEBY
page.content: {Harmston}facilities depend largely on the Hospital Social Club eg.cricket and football.The Rugby Club commences the 1985_86 season without a pitch,the previous hospital field having been sold. The Women's Institute thrives with 30 members,some from{Coleby. {Harmston }Young Farmers' Club has a keen membership from the district around. There are old people's clubs in both villages.Gardeners and the physically handicapped join Waddington clubs.{ {Harmston_Coleby}Youth Club is one year old,with 18 members.{Coleby}Football Club uses a field maintained by{Coleby Playingfield Assoc. A Toddlers' Group meets at{Coleby.}The Blankney Hunt with a large field meets annually in each village,a sight to behold, as it moves off between the stone-walled lanes and pantiled_roofed houses.
